Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Whether a worker is assigned to a task

Name: select_user_story_for_sprint
Description: Whether a user story is selected for the sprint backlog

Name: allocate_budget_to_feature
Description: Percentage of budget allocated to a feature

Name: set_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Whether a sprint goal is achieved

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: Duration of a sprint in days

Name: set_task_effort_estimate
Description: Effort estimate for a task in hours
